column4: Hi, I use alsa for sound but I have a some problems since yesterday: I can relay the microphone to the output withouht problems, but I cannot record with any program. It doesn't really say that /dev/dsp is in use or something, It just won't work... any Ideas what I could do now?
run gamix and try to change mixer settings. Most likely you're recording wrong input or so.
ok thanks I'll have a try
